attributes.action: Charge Foreign motorists a temporary road tax on entering UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to relieve the financial burden on UK motorists, what about charging foreign visiting motorists a temporary road tax for use of British Roads while on Holiday. This is currently done is Switzerland without problems. Caravans, Vans, Trucks, etc would have an additional charge. A small window sticker with a 1/3/6 month duration would suffice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
